title: Lawrence of Arabia
description: The story of T.E. Lawrence, the English officer who successfully united and led the diverse, often warring, Arab tribes during World War I in order to fight the Turks.

title: To Kill a Mockingbird
oscars_won_details: Best Actor in a Leading Role
Best Writing, Screenplay Based on Material from Another Medium
description: Atticus Finch, a widowed lawyer in Depression-era Alabama, defends a black man against an undeserved rape charge, and his children against prejudice.

title: The Manchurian Candidate
description: A former prisoner of war is brainwashed as an unwitting assassin for an international Communist conspiracy.

title: Dr. No
description: A resourceful British government agent seeks answers in a case involving the disappearance of a colleague and the disruption of the American space program.

title: The Man Who Shot Liberty Valance
description: A senator returns to a western town for the funeral of an old friend and tells the story of his origins.

title: What Ever Happened to Baby Jane?
description: A former child star torments her paraplegic sister in their decaying Hollywood mansion.

title: The Longest Day
description: The events of D-Day, told on a grand scale from both the Allied and German points of view.

title: Lolita
description: A middle-aged college professor becomes infatuated with a fourteen-year-old nymphet.

title: Cape Fear
description: A lawyer's family is stalked by a man he once helped send to jail.

title: The Miracle Worker
oscars_won_details: Best Actress in a Leading Role
Best Actress in a Supporting Role
description: The story of Anne Sullivan's struggle to teach the blind and deaf Helen Keller how to communicate.

title: The Music Man
oscars_won_details: Best Music, Scoring of Music, Adaptation or Treatment
description: Traveling con artist Harold Hill targets the naive residents of a small town in 1910 Iowa by posing as a boys' band leader to raise money for band instruments and uniforms he doesn't intend to provide.

title: Days of Wine and Roses
description: An alcoholic falls in love with and gets married to a young woman, whom he systematically addicts to booze so they can share his "passion" together.

title: Harakiri
description: When a ronin requesting seppuku at a feudal lord's palace is told of the brutal suicide of another ronin who previously visited, he reveals how their pasts are intertwined - and in doing so challenges the clan's integrity.

title: Ivan's Childhood
description: During WWII, 12-year-old Ivan bonds with three Soviet officers while scouting the German lines, but his need for revenge against the Nazis may be his undoing.

title: Carnival of Souls
description: After a traumatic accident, a woman becomes drawn to a mysterious abandoned carnival.

title: Sanjuro
description: A crafty ronin helps a young man and his fellow samurai save his uncle, who has been framed and imprisoned by a corrupt superintendent.

title: Birdman of Alcatraz
description: A surly convicted murderer held in permanent isolation redeems himself when he becomes a renowned bird expert.

title: Mutiny on the Bounty
description: In 1787, British ship Bounty leaves Portsmouth to bring a cargo of bread-fruit from Tahiti, but the savage on-board conditions imposed by Captain Bligh trigger a mutiny.

title: How the West Was Won
oscars_won_details: Best Writing, Story and Screenplay - Written Directly for the Screen
description: A family saga covering several decades of Westward expansion in the nineteenth century, including the Gold Rush, the Civil War, and the building of the railroads.

title: Jules and Jim
description: Decades of a love triangle concerning two friends and an impulsive woman.

title: Cléo from 5 to 7
description: A hypochondriac singer waits for the result of a biopsy while contemplating her existence.

title: The Exterminating Angel
description: The guests at an upper-class dinner party find themselves unable to leave the drawing room.

title: Vivre Sa Vie
description: Twelve episodic tales in the life of a Parisian woman and her slow descent into prostitution.

title: Winter Light
description: A pastor of a small rural church struggles with his faith and the silence of God.

title: Knife in the Water
description: On their way to a sailing trip, an aging husband and wife pick up a young hitchhiker.

title: Ride the High Country
description: An ex-lawman, fell on hard times, is hired to transport gold from a mining community through dangerous territory.

title: Gypsy
description: The rise of burlesque stripper Gypsy Rose Lee and her conflict with her overpowering mother, Mama Rose.

title: Sweet Bird of Youth
oscars_won_details: Best Actor in a Supporting Role
description: A drifter returns to his hometown with an aging movie star in hopes of obtaining a movie contract from her to marry his true love.

title: Long Day's Journey Into Night
description: The drug-addicted matriarch of a dysfunctional family and her three loved ones recount their lives over the course of a single day.

title: Requiem for a Heavyweight
description: A washed-up heavyweight boxer tries to free himself from his corrupt manager and find a new life.

title: Billy Budd
description: In 1797, a naive seaman is impressed into the British Navy, where his innocent nature makes him the target of a sadistic master-at-arms.

title: David and Lisa
description: A study of the emotional storm of two disturbed adolescents who find love.

title: Freud: The Secret Passion
description: A pseudo-biographical look at five years in the life of Sigmund Freud, from 1885 to 1890.

title: Two for the Seesaw
description: A Nebraska lawyer flees his marriage and career to New York City, where he meets a generous, bohemian dancer.

title: Hatari!
description: A group of men trap wild animals in Africa for zoos.

title: The 300 Spartans
description: A small Greek army leads a desperate defense against the massive invading Persian army in 480 BCE.

title: Burn, Witch, Burn
description: A skeptical college professor discovers that his wife has been practicing witchcraft to further his career.

title: Advise & Consent
description: Senate investigation into the President's newly nominated Secretary of State gives light to a secret from the past, which may not only ruin the candidate, but the President's character as well.

title: Lonely Are the Brave
description: A defiant cowboy gets himself thrown into jail in order to help a friend break out, but finds the world has moved on without him.

title: The Trial
description: An unassuming office worker is arrested and stands trial, but he is never told what he is accused of.

title: An Autumn Afternoon
description: An aging widower arranges a marriage for his only daughter.

title: Divorce Italian Style
oscars_won_details: Best Writing, Story and Screenplay - Written Directly for the Screen
description: A married Sicilian baron falls in love with his cousin and vows to wed her, but with divorce illegal, he must hatch a crime of passion to be free of his wife.

title: Sundays and Cybèle
description: The innocent but obsessive relationship between a suffering war veteran and a young girl is misunderstood by the world around them.

title: Period of Adjustment
description: Two couples, one newlywed and the other long-married, face their marital problems on Christmas Eve.

title: That Touch of Mink
description: A rich businessman and a young woman are attracted to each other, but he only wants an affair while she wants marriage.

title: Bon Voyage!
description: The Willard family of Terre Haute, Indiana, heads to Europe for a long-awaited vacation.

title: Tender Is the Night
description: A psychiatrist marries one of his patients, a wealthy woman, but as she slowly recovers, his own vitality drains away.

title: A Kind of Loving
description: A young draftsman in an industrial northern English city is forced to marry a coworker after she becomes pregnant.

title: The Loneliness of the Long Distance Runner
description: A rebellious youth sentenced to a borstal for burgling a bakery rises through the ranks of the institution through his prowess as a long distance runner.

title: Mamma Roma
description: An ex-prostitute tries to start a new life selling vegetables with her 16-year-old son.

title: L'Eclisse
description: A young woman meets a vital stockbroker, but their affair is doomed because of his materialistic nature.
